faq.question: Where can I find the news?
answer: Some Top news will just display on the center of the home site; (the news is displayed on chronological order by default)
.If you don't find the news you want, then click the correspond link on the top of the home site.

faq.question: Can I search for some news?
answer: Yes, Of course. After you clicked the 'news' link, there will be a pull-down menu for search waiting for you.
ou can search based on the date/relational people/key words.

faq.question: How do I post news?
answer: Use the 'user submit'link on the top-right of the home site
Then click the correspond link for post news.

faq.question: Where can I find the information about Lost & Found?
answer: Click the correspond link on the top of the home site

faq.question: How do I post a message about Lost & Found?
answer: Follow the answer for post news.

faq.question: Where can I find the information about Sponsorship?
answer: Click the correspond link on the top of the home site;
Be careful about your email address. If you forget your password and email at the same time, there will be no way for you to login again.
